org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.painting
Class BasePaintVisitor

java.lang.Object
  org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.painting.BasePaintVisitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Visitor, IPlugin, IPaintVisitor
Direct Known Subclasses:
ODRPaintVisitor, SimplePaintVisitor
public abstract class BasePaintVisitor
extends java.lang.Object
implements Visitor, IPaintVisitor

The BasePaintVisitor simplifies the development of custom PaintVisitors. It provides for styles, LOD, ways and already draws routes and current location. Heavily Adapted from the Josm-Sourcecode.

Author:
imi, Marcus Wolschon
